about_the_game:
You are given high power to fight your way through different regions of a world taken over by the evil forces of hell. You must clear the invasion and save the world, only then will you be deemed worthy to keep thy attained powers.

Key Features


  • Endless Mayhem - travel through randomly generated dungeons, halls and arenas, across different settings - underground, underwater, in air, and etc.
  • Parkour! - get creative with your movement in areas with tall walls and monkey bars!
  • You Only Live Once - death means a reset in progress, so beware!
  • Huge Arsenal - gather different kinds of weapons to use in combat against enemies. Weapons can be upgraded and hellified with the use of hell shards!
  • Resource Management - utilizing each weapon is key to fast elimination of enemies and recovery of ammunition!

short_description: HELLGRINDER is a stylized first-person shooter roguelike game where you battle off against hordes of demons from hell, using a variety of different weapons. Your goal is to stop those pesky demons once and for all, but the adventure won't be easy...
